summary: Access data on Harvest for operations like managing clients, companies, contacts, estimates, expenses, invoices, projects, tasks, time entries, and users.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the method of authentication: Access Token or OAuth2.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on (e.g., client, company, contact, estimate, expense, invoice, project, task, time entry, user, or make a custom API call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., create, delete, get, get all, update, or make a custom API call).
